snippet.title: Isabelle 64 1.2 Release Update (Isabelle in SM64! #2) | [Isabelle Mods #1.1]
snippet.description:
This update was supposed to be released a few weeks ago but due to events, i delayed it, up to today, so anyways, here's the 1.2 update, there are lot of changes compared to previous versions.

Downloads:

Japanese Shizue 64 1.2:
Mediafire: https://www.mediafire.com/file/5fjl7e01m07fykn/Shizue_64_1.2.zip/file
GDrive: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QBBxlQ2pThZ-EibvMoHTb8UD60UDfnM4/view?usp=sharing
English Isabelle 64 1.2:
Mediafire: https://www.mediafire.com/file/1ic4v1ndk3qu861/Isabelle_64_1.2.zip/file
GDrive: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1rW1wtfwa7qYwI5NotcV4dnyKanDFc8-J/view?usp=sharing


Detailed Changelog:

-Redone ROM, built using decomp project. As such:
ROM now has the same size as the original SM64 ROM
Removed dependecy of expansion pak, fully console compatible and no need to set 8MB on PJ64
Uses F3DZEX (better graphics code than the original game had), lagless (No DDD lag)
Optimized Isabelle Model, looks way better than the first version
Model replaced such as: Star as Gold Leaf, SM64DS Coins and Key
Now has a Japanese version (Shizue 64)

New:
Added outfit menu! Now you can use SSBU's color outfits pressing the L button
Green, Yellow, Pink, Red, Purple, Teal, Grey, Blue
Added mid-air jumps! Press A again while you first jump to do a second jump
3 new facial expressions: worried, happy and sad

Misc:
Replaced HUD, File Select and Metal Textures
Slightly changed text in JP and US (Thanks Eddio0141 for the JP text edits)

Credits in the old video still apply.

Social Media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AloXado320
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AloXado320
Discord Server: https://discord.gg/KHU9YHw
Enjoy the video!
